text: The 1915 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1915 college football season. The head coach was C. B. Metheny coaching the team in his third year. The team finished the season with a final record of 5–3. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1915 Geneva Covenanters football team
